original: @310b ` // sbyin pa'i rabs kyi smon lam bzhugs /
analyzed: @310b ` // sbyin pa'i rabs kyi smon lam bzhugs /
translated: The Aspiration of the Lineage of Generosity

original: * // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: * // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels!

original: zas skom bzang po ro zhim zhing mdog sdug la dri bsung ldan zhing ngad ldang ba /
analyzed: zas skom bzang po ro zhim zhing mdog sdug la dri bsung ldan zhing ngad ldang ba /
translated: Excellent food and drink, delicious, beautiful, fragrant, and aromatic,

original: yon tan phun sum tshogs pas brgyan pa /
analyzed: yon tan phun sum tshogs pas brgyan pa /
translated: adorned with perfect qualities,

original: dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa'i nags tshal dkon zhing dri ma med la rgyan gyis klubs pa /
analyzed: dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa'i nags tshal dkon zhing dri ma med la rgyan gyis klubs pa /
translated: like a forest of wish-fulfilling trees, rare, stainless, and adorned with ornaments,

original: yal ga'i thor to'i ljid kyis g-yur za la mgo lcogs me tog kha phye zhing 'dab mas legs par brgyan te /
analyzed: yal ga'i thor to'i ljid kyis g-yur za la mgo lcogs me tog kha phye zhing 'dab mas legs par brgyan te /
translated: with the weight of the branches' fruit swaying, the flowers blooming, and the leaves beautifully arranged,

original: bung ba lang long khyus lding zhing 'phungs pa rnams kyis gzhib cing non pa'i shugs kyis bag tsam 'dar ldem ldem la /
analyzed: bung ba lang long khyus lding zhing 'phungs pa rnams kyis gzhib cing non pa'i shugs kyis bag tsam 'dar ldem ldem la /

original: rin chen yal ga dang margad lcug phran gyi bla re 'jol ba dag mngon par sgrub par byed pa /
analyzed: rin chen yal ga dang margad lcug phran gyi bla re 'jol ba dag mngon par sgrub par byed pa /
translated: They manifest canopies of jeweled branches and emerald vines,

original: 'gro ba dag tu ma tshor bar 'gro ba'i g-yang sa chen po yang ba dag tu mar me snang gsal dag cing dri ma med pa lta bu byin pa gang la bsod nams dang / bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang / dge ba dang /
analyzed: 'gro ba dag tu ma tshor bar 'gro ba'i g-yang sa chen po yang ba dag tu mar me snang gsal dag cing dri ma med pa lta bu byin pa gang la bsod nams dang / bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang / dge ba dang /
translated: The great abyss of falling into the lower realms, which is not felt by beings, is illuminated by the light of the lamp of the great generosity of the great being, the great benefactor, who is the basis of all that is good, which is the cause of merit, virtue, and goodness.

original: dge ba'i rgyu dang mthun pa bde dgu'i gzhir gyur pa des ni sbyin bdag chen po bdag nyid che ba che ge mo zhig gi lus dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis bsgrubs pa la tshe dang / kha dog dang / stobs dang / gzi byin dang /
